    void
    choose7RandomPoints(PointValueDistr pv, Random sr, Set<BigInteger> alreadySelected, List<algorithms.util.PairInt> outputPoints)
    NOT READY FOR USE YET.
    PointValueDistr
    createSpatialDistBasedValues(Set<algorithms.util.PairInt> points, int numCellsPerDimensions)
    Given a set of points, determine cells across the data (roughly k cells for each dimension of roughly equal area) to create seeds, then create a list of distance based values (distance of points from the nearest seeds) that is intended to be used for random selection of points from the total set in a spatially stratified manner, biased towards points further from the seed centers.
    protected PointValueDistr
    createSpatialDistBasedValues(Set<algorithms.util.PairInt> points, int numCellsPerDimensions, boolean inverse)
    Given a set of points, determine cells across the data (roughly k cells for each dimension or roughly equal area) to create seeds, then create a list of distance based values (distance of points from the nearest seeds) that is intended to be used for random selection of points from the total set in a spatially stratified manner.
    PointValueDistr
    createSpatialInvDistBasedValues(Set<algorithms.util.PairInt> points, int numCellsPerDimensions)
    Given a set of points, determine cells across the data (roughly k cells for each dimension of roughly equal area) to create seeds, then create a list of distance based values (distance of points from the nearest seeds) that is intended to be used for random selection of points from the total set in a spatially stratified manner, biased towards points closer to the seed centers.

      NOT READY FOR USE YET. The results are not uniform yet - there are irregularities for drawing the smallest indexes (less than 2*k) and for the largest indexes (larger than nPoints - 2*k).

    • randomlyChooseKBitNumber

      BigInteger randomlyChooseKBitNumber(PointValueDistr pv, Random sr, int k)
      randomly choose a k bit number that is a bit vector that has set bits representing the pv.points indexes selected. NOT READY FOR USE YET. The results are not uniform yet - there are irregularities for drawing the smallest indexes (less than 2*k) and for the largest indexes (larger than nPoints - 2*k). NOTE: keeping this nearly private until have tested range of values for k. needs to be correct for k=7.
      Parameters:
      sr -
      k -
      maxValue -
      Returns:

    • randomlyChooseKBitNumber

      BigInteger randomlyChooseKBitNumber(int nIndexes, Random sr, int k)
      randomly choose a k bit number that is a bit vector that has set bits representing the pv.points indexes selected. NOT READY FOR USE YET. The results are not uniform yet - there are irregularities for drawing the smallest indexes (less than 2*k) and for the largest indexes (larger than nPoints - 2*k). NOTE: keeping this nearly private until have tested range of values for k. needs to be correct for k=7.
      Parameters:
      nIndexes -
      sr -
      k -
      Returns:

    • createSpatialInvDistBasedValues

      public PointValueDistr createSpatialInvDistBasedValues(Set<algorithms.util.PairInt> points, int numCellsPerDimensions)
      Given a set of points, determine cells across the data (roughly k cells for each dimension of roughly equal area) to create seeds, then create a list of distance based values (distance of points from the nearest seeds) that is intended to be used for random selection of points from the total set in a spatially stratified manner, biased towards points closer to the seed centers.
      Parameters:
      points -
      numCellsPerDimensions -
      Returns:

    • createSpatialDistBasedValues

      public PointValueDistr createSpatialDistBasedValues(Set<algorithms.util.PairInt> points, int numCellsPerDimensions)
      Given a set of points, determine cells across the data (roughly k cells for each dimension of roughly equal area) to create seeds, then create a list of distance based values (distance of points from the nearest seeds) that is intended to be used for random selection of points from the total set in a spatially stratified manner, biased towards points further from the seed centers.
      Parameters:
      points -
      numCellsPerDimensions -
      Returns:

    • createSpatialDistBasedValues

      protected PointValueDistr createSpatialDistBasedValues(Set<algorithms.util.PairInt> points, int numCellsPerDimensions, boolean inverse)
      Given a set of points, determine cells across the data (roughly k cells for each dimension or roughly equal area) to create seeds, then create a list of distance based values (distance of points from the nearest seeds) that is intended to be used for random selection of points from the total set in a spatially stratified manner.
      Parameters:
      points -
      numCellsPerDimensions - #param inverse if true, uses maxDist - distance for distances to weight for points closer to the seeds.
      Returns:
